are you eligible?
Only applicable to new customers who do not have any or do not cancel any banking relationship within the past 12 months. Not applicable to existing Citibanking or Citi Priority banking relationship whose relationship is transferred to Citi Plus banking relationship.
You must be aged 18 or above and hold a valid Hong Kong permanent identity card.
what you need to know
Apply for Citi Plus now to enjoy up to 2.67% p.a.saving rate and 6% p.a. for US Time Deposit
Earn passive income effortlessly - Open a 1-month Hong Kong Dollar fixed deposit and enjoy up to 4.27% annual interest rate!

*Information as of 8 Jan 2024
Citi Plus Travelling essential - Use Citibank Global Wallet to enjoy up to 3% Cash Rebate by using Citibank Global Wallet to make eligible In-store retail purchases or Online purchases settled in foreign currencies.
